detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow for processing 16S and ITS amplicon sequences, handling quality control, clustering, and taxonomy assignment.

name: aviary
one_line_profile: Hybrid assembly and MAG recovery pipeline
detailed_description: A comprehensive metagenomics pipeline for hybrid assembly (long/short reads) and Metagenome-Assembled Genome (MAG) recovery.

name: MetScale
one_line_profile: Scalable metagenome analysis workflows
detailed_description: A collection of Snakemake workflows designed to scale metagenomic analyses, including quality control, assembly, and annotation.

name: us-atlas
one_line_profile: Pre-built TopoJSON geospatial datasets for the United States
detailed_description: A repository providing pre-built TopoJSON files derived from U.S. Census Bureau data, used for geospatial visualization and analysis of U.S. cartography.

name: world-atlas
one_line_profile: Pre-built TopoJSON geospatial datasets for the world
detailed_description: A repository providing pre-built TopoJSON files derived from Natural Earth data, used for global geospatial visualization and analysis.

name: TTClust
one_line_profile: Tool for clustering molecular dynamics trajectories
detailed_description: A Python program to clusterize molecular dynamics trajectories from various formats (Amber, Gromacs, Charmm, etc.), aiding in the analysis of protein conformational states.

name: tracespipe
one_line_profile: Pipeline for reconstruction and analysis of viral and host genomes
detailed_description: A pipeline designed for the reconstruction and analysis of viral and host genomes from metagenomic data, particularly at the multi-organ level.

name: GlobalBuildingAtlas
one_line_profile: Global dataset of building polygons, heights, and 3D models
detailed_description: A comprehensive open dataset containing global building information, including polygons, height data, and LoD1 3D models, useful for urban science and spatial analysis.
